summary: Four friends share one major concern: the opposite sex. These Casanovas are constantly obsessed about their relationships with women; they meet in a café on a regular basis to discuss their... See full summary »
cast: Alejo Sauras|Lucía Jiménez|Asier Etxeandia|Elena Ballesteros|Inma Cuesta|Diego París|Javier Godino|Terele Pávez|Lidia Navarro|César Pérez|Camilo Vázquez|Miriam Blanco|Penélope Velasco|Pilar Abella|Milo Taboada|Joaquín Abad|Paloma Tabasco|Marta Nieto|Álex Pastor|Alberto Rubio|Resu Morales|David Carrillo|Pablo Olewski|Carla Nieto|Gloria Mezcua|Marta Gutiérrez-Abad|Silvia Juliá|César Oliver
title: Café solo... o con ellas
